skills.name: Android
skills.description: Android is a mobile operating system developed by Google, based on the Linux kernel and designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Java is a general-purpose computer programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented, and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

skills.name: Ruby
skills.description: Ruby is a dynamic, reflective, object-oriented, general-purpose programming language.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: Python is a widely used high-level programming language for general-purpose programming, created by Guido van Rossum and first released in 1991.
